title: I spent money to buy Project Vi, got a shard 10 secs after? Refund Please???
body: I don't have any refund tokens, but I bought Vi's new Project skin and a Project Skin Orb and literally drew her skin not even 10 seconds afterwards?! Please Refund me Riot, I literally just gave you free money. {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

replies.body: I'm not 100% sure what the policy is on those orbs, since they are known to have random content which can give duplicates. With this being such an unlucky drop (since you had already bought that skin) I'd say it'd be worth reaching out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to ask about that refund!
